ayas.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
ayas.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
ayas.transliteration: bismillāhir raḥmānir raḥīm

ayas.arabic: تَنزِيلُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ
ayas.translation: The revelation of the Scripture is from Allah, the Mighty, the Wise.
ayas.transliteration: tanzīlul kitābi minallāhil `azīzil ḥakīm

ayas.arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَآ إِلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ بِٱلْحَقِّ فَٱعْبُدِ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصًا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ
ayas.translation: Lo! We have revealed the Scripture unto thee (Muhammad) with truth; so worship Allah, making religion pure for Him (only).
ayas.transliteration: innā anzalnā ilaykal kitāba bil ḥaqqi fa`budillāha mukhliṣal lahud dīn

ayas.arabic: أَلَا لِلَّهِ ٱلدِّينُ ٱلْخَالِصُ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوْلِيَآءَ مَا نَعْبُدُهُمْ إِلَّا لِيُقَرِّبُونَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ زُلْفَىٰٓ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَهُمْ فِى مَا هُمْ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهْدِى مَنْ هُوَ كَـٰذِبٌ كَفَّارٌ
ayas.translation: Surely pure religion is for Allah only. And those who choose protecting friends beside Him (say): We worship them only that they may bring us near unto Allah. Lo! Allah will judge between them concerning that wherein they differ. Lo! Allah guideth not him who is a liar, an ingrate.
ayas.transliteration: alā lillāhid dīnul khāliṣ ۚ wal ladhīnat-takhadhū min dūnihi awliyā-a mā na`buduhum illā liyuqarribūnā ilallāhi zulfā innallāha yaḥkumu baynahum fī mā hum fīhi yakhtalifūn ۗ innallāha lā yahdī man huwa kādhibun kaffār

ayas.arabic: لَّوْ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا لَّٱصْطَفَىٰ مِمَّا يَخْلُقُ مَا يَشَآءُ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ ۖ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْوَٰحِدُ ٱلْقَهَّارُ
ayas.translation: If Allah had willed to choose a son, He could have chosen what He would of that which He hath created. Be He Glorified! He is Allah, the One, the Absolute.
ayas.transliteration: law arādallāhu an yattakhidha waladal laṣṭafā mimmā yakhluqu mā yashā-u ۚ subḥānah ۖ huwallāhul wāḥidul qahhār

ayas.arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ يُكَوِّرُ ٱلَّيْلَ عَلَى ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُكَوِّرُ ٱلنَّهَارَ عَلَى ٱلَّيْلِ ۖ وَسَخَّرَ ٱلشَّمْسَ وَٱلْقَمَرَ ۖ كُلٌّ يَجْرِى لِأَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۗ أَلَا هُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفَّـٰرُ
ayas.translation: He hath created the heavens and the earth with truth. He maketh night to succeed day, and He maketh day to succeed night, and He constraineth the sun and the moon to give service, each running on for an appointed term. Is not He the Mighty, the Forgiver?
ayas.transliteration: khalaqas samāwāti wal-arḍa bil ḥaqq ۖ yukawwirul layla `alan nahāri wayukawwirun nahāra `alal layl ۖ wasakhharash shamsa wal qamar ۖ kullun yajrī li-ajalin musammā ۗ alā huwal `azīzul ghaffār

ayas.arabic: خَلَقَكُم مِّن نَّفْسٍ وَٰحِدَةٍ ثُمَّ جَعَلَ مِنْهَا زَوْجَهَا وَأَنزَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ ثَمَـٰنِيَةَ أَزْوَٰجٍ ۚ يَخْلُقُكُمْ فِى بُطُونِ أُمَّهَـٰتِكُمْ خَلْقًا مِّنۢ بَعْدِ خَلْقٍ فِى ظُلُمَـٰتٍ ثَلَـٰثٍ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمْ لَهُ ٱلْمُلْكُ ۖ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُصْرَفُونَ
ayas.translation: He created you from one being, then from that (being) He made its mate; and He hath provided for you of cattle eight kinds. He created you in the wombs of your mothers, creation after creation, in a threefold gloom. Such is Allah, your Lord. His is the Sovereignty. There is no Allah save Him. How then are ye turned away?
ayas.transliteration: khalaqakum min nafsin wāḥidatin thumma ja`ala minhā zawjahā wa-anzala lakum minal-an`āmi thamāniyata azwāj ۚ yakhluqukum fī buṭūni ummahātikum khalqan min ba`di khalqin fī ẓulumātin thalāth ۚ dhālikumullāhu rabbukum lahul mulk ۖ lā ilāha illā huw ۖ fa-annā tuṣrafūn

ayas.arabic: إِن تَكْفُرُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَنِىٌّ عَنكُمْ ۖ وَلَا يَرْضَىٰ لِعِبَادِهِ ٱلْكُفْرَ ۖ وَإِن تَشْكُرُوا۟ يَرْضَهُ لَكُمْ ۗ وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ ۗ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُم مَّرْجِعُكُمْ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
ayas.translation: If ye are thankless, yet Allah is Independent of you, though He is not pleased with thanklessness for His bondmen; and if ye are thankful He is pleased therewith for you. No laden soul will bear another's load. Then unto your Lord is your return; and He will tell you what ye used to do. Lo! He knoweth what is in the breasts (of men).
ayas.transliteration: in takfurū fa-innallāha ghaniyyun `ankum ۖ walā yarḍā li`ibādihil kufr ۖ wa in tashkurū yarḍahu lakum ۗ walā taziru wāziratun wizra ukhrā ۗ thumma ilā rabbikum marji`ukum fayunabbi-ukum bimā kuntum ta`malūn ۚ innahu `alīmun bidhātiṣ ṣudūr

ayas.arabic: وَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ ضُرٌّ دَعَا رَبَّهُۥ مُنِيبًا إِلَيْهِ ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلَهُۥ نِعْمَةً مِّنْهُ نَسِىَ مَا كَانَ يَدْعُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ مِن قَبْلُ وَجَعَلَ لِلَّهِ أَندَادًا لِّيُضِلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ ۚ قُلْ تَمَتَّعْ بِكُفْرِكَ قَلِيلًا ۖ إِنَّكَ مِنْ أَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلنَّارِ
ayas.translation: And when some hurt toucheth man, he crieth unto his Lord, turning unto Him (repentant). Then, when He granteth him a boon from Him he forgetteth that for which he cried unto Him before, and setteth up rivals to Allah that he may beguile (men) from his way. Say (O Muhammad, unto such an one): Take pleasure in thy disbelief a while. Lo! thou art of the owners of the Fire.
ayas.transliteration: wa idhā massal-insāna ḍurrun da`ā rabbahu munīban ilayhi thumma idhā khawwalahu ni`matan minhu nasiya mā kāna yad`ū ilayhi min qablu waja`ala lillāhi andādal liyuḍilla `an sabīlih ۚ qul tamatta` bikufrika qalīlā ۖ innaka min aṣ-ḥābin nār

ayas.arabic: أَمَّنْ هُوَ قَـٰنِتٌ ءَانَآءَ ٱلَّيْلِ سَاجِدًا وَقَآئِمًا يَحْذَرُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةَ وَيَرْجُوا۟ رَحْمَةَ رَبِّهِۦ ۗ قُلْ هَلْ يَسْتَوِى ٱلَّذِينَ يَعْلَمُونَ وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ ۗ إِنَّمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
ayas.translation: Is he who payeth adoration in the watches of the night, prostrate and standing, bewaring of the Hereafter and hoping for the mercy of his Lord, (to be accounted equal with a disbeliever)? Say (unto them, O Muhammad): Are those who know equal with those who know not? But only men of understanding will pay heed.
ayas.transliteration: amman huwa qānitun ānā-al layli sājidan waqā-iman yaḥdharul-ākhirata wayarjū raḥmata rabbih ۗ qul hal yastawil ladhīna ya`lamūna wal ladhīna lā ya`lamūn ۗ innamā yatadhakkaru ulul-albāb

ayas.arabic: قُلْ يَـٰعِبَادِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ ۚ لِلَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا۟ فِى هَـٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةٌ ۗ وَأَرْضُ ٱللَّهِ وَٰسِعَةٌ ۗ إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى ٱلصَّـٰبِرُونَ أَجْرَهُم بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
ayas.translation: Say: O My bondmen who believe! Observe your duty to your Lord. For those who do good in this world there is good, and Allah's earth is spacious. Verily the steadfast will be paid their wages without stint.
ayas.transliteration: qul yā`ibādil ladhīna āmanut-taqū rabbakum ۚ lilladhīna aḥsanū fī hādhihid dunyā ḥasanah ۗ wa-arḍullāhi wāsi`ah ۗ innamā yuwaffaṣ ṣābirūna ajrahum bighayri ḥisāb

ayas.arabic: قُلْ إِنِّىٓ أُمِرْتُ أَنْ أَعْبُدَ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصًا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ
ayas.translation: Say (O Muhammad): Lo! I am commanded to worship Allah, making religion pure for Him (only).
ayas.transliteration: qul innī umirtu an a`budallāha mukhliṣal lahud dīn

ayas.arabic: وَأُمِرْتُ لِأَنْ أَكُونَ أَوَّلَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ
ayas.translation: And I am commanded to be the first of those who are muslims (surrender unto Him).
ayas.transliteration: wa-umirtu li-an akūna awwalal-muslimīn

ayas.arabic: قُلْ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ إِنْ عَصَيْتُ رَبِّى عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
ayas.translation: Say: Lo! if I should disobey my Lord, I fear the doom of a tremendous Day.
ayas.transliteration: qul innī akhāfu in `aṣaytu rabbī `adhāba yawmin `aẓīm

ayas.arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهَ أَعْبُدُ مُخْلِصًا لَّهُۥ دِينِى
ayas.translation: Say: Allah I worship, making my religion pure for Him (only).
ayas.transliteration: qulillāha a`budu mukhliṣal lahu dīnī

ayas.arabic: فَٱعْبُدُوا۟ مَا شِئْتُم مِّن دُونِهِۦ ۗ قُلْ إِنَّ ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَأَهْلِيهِمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۗ أَلَا ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْخُسْرَانُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
ayas.translation: Then worship what ye will beside Him. Say: The losers will be those who lose themselves and their housefolk on the Day of Resurrection. Ah, that will be the manifest loss!
ayas.transliteration: fa`budū mā shi-tum min dūnih ۗ qul innal khāsirīnal ladhīna khasirū anfusahum wa-ahlīhim yawmal qiyāmah ۗ alā dhālika huwal khusrānul mubīn

ayas.arabic: لَهُم مِّن فَوْقِهِمْ ظُلَلٌ مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَمِن تَحْتِهِمْ ظُلَلٌ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يُخَوِّفُ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦ عِبَادَهُۥ ۚ يَـٰعِبَادِ فَٱتَّقُونِ
ayas.translation: They have an awning of fire above them and beneath them a dais (of fire). With this doth Allah appal His bondmen. O My bondmen, therefor fear Me!
ayas.transliteration: lahum min fawqihim ẓulalun minan nāri wa min taḥtihim ẓulal ۚ dhālika yukhawwifullāhu bihi `ibādah ۚ yā`ibādi fattaqūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱجْتَنَبُوا۟ ٱلطَّـٰغُوتَ أَن يَعْبُدُوهَا وَأَنَابُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ لَهُمُ ٱلْبُشْرَىٰ ۚ فَبَشِّرْ عِبَادِ
ayas.translation: And those who put away false gods lest they should worship them and turn to Allah in repentance, for them there are glad tidings. Therefor give good tidings (O Muhammad) to My bondmen
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīnaj-tanabuṭ ṭāghūta an ya`budūhā wa-anābū ilallāhi lahumul bushrā ۚ fabashhir `ibād

ayas.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَسْتَمِعُونَ ٱلْقَوْلَ فَيَتَّبِعُونَ أَحْسَنَهُۥٓ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ هَدَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۖ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمْ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
ayas.translation: Who hear advice and follow the best thereof. Such are those whom Allah guideth, and such are men of understanding.
ayas.transliteration: alladhīna yastami`ūnal qawla fayattabi`ūna aḥsanah ۚ ulā-ikal ladhīna hadāhumullāh ۖ wa-ulā-ika hum ulul-albāb

ayas.arabic: أَفَمَنْ حَقَّ عَلَيْهِ كَلِمَةُ ٱلْعَذَابِ أَفَأَنتَ تُنقِذُ مَن فِى ٱلنَّارِ
ayas.translation: Is he on whom the word of doom is fulfilled (to be helped), and canst thou (O Muhammad) rescue him who is in the Fire?
ayas.transliteration: afaman ḥaqqa `alayhi kalimatul `adhābi afa-anta tunqidhu man fin nār

ayas.arabic: لَـٰكِنِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ رَبَّهُمْ لَهُمْ غُرَفٌ مِّن فَوْقِهَا غُرَفٌ مَّبْنِيَّةٌ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۖ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ لَا يُخْلِفُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمِيعَادَ
ayas.translation: But those who keep their duty to their Lord, for them are lofty halls with lofty halls above them, built (for them), beneath which rivers flow. (It is) a promise of Allah. Allah faileth not His promise.
ayas.transliteration: lākinil ladhīnat-taqaw rabbahum lahum ghurafun min fawqihā ghurafun mabniyyatun tajrī min taḥtihal-anhār ۖ wa`dallāh ۖ lā yukhlifullāhul mī`ād

ayas.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَسَلَكَهُۥ يَنَـٰبِيعَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ثُمَّ يُخْرِجُ بِهِۦ زَرْعًا مُّخْتَلِفًا أَلْوَٰنُهُۥ ثُمَّ يَهِيجُ فَتَرَىٰهُ مُصْفَرًّا ثُمَّ يَجْعَلُهُۥ حُطَـٰمًا ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
ayas.translation: Hast thou not seen how Allah hath sent down water from the sky and hath caused it to penetrate the earth as watersprings, and afterward thereby produceth crops of divers hues; and afterward they wither and thou seest them turn yellow; then He maketh them chaff. Lo! herein verily is a reminder for men of understanding.
ayas.transliteration: alam tara annallāha anzala minas samā-i mā-an fasalakahu yanābī`a fil-arḍi thumma yukhriju bihi zar`an mukhtalifan alwānuhu thumma yahīju fatarāhu muṣfarran thumma yaj`aluhu ḥuṭāmā ۚ inna fī dhālika ladhikrā li-ulil-albāb

ayas.arabic: أَفَمَن شَرَحَ ٱللَّهُ صَدْرَهُۥ لِلْإِسْلَـٰمِ فَهُوَ عَلَىٰ نُورٍ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ ۚ فَوَيْلٌ لِّلْقَـٰسِيَةِ قُلُوبُهُم مِّن ذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
ayas.translation: Is he whose bosom Allah hath expanded for Al-Islam, so that he followeth a light from his Lord, (as he who disbelieveth)? Then woe unto those whose hearts are hardened against remembrance of Allah. Such are in plain error.
ayas.transliteration: afaman sharaḥallāhu ṣadrahu lilislāmi fahuwa `alā nūrin min rabbih ۚ fawaylul lilqāsiyati qulūbuhum min dhikrillāh ۚ ulā-ika fī ḍalālin mubīn

ayas.arabic: ٱللَّهُ نَزَّلَ أَحْسَنَ ٱلْحَدِيثِ كِتَـٰبًا مُّتَشَـٰبِهًا مَّثَانِىَ تَقْشَعِرُّ مِنْهُ جُلُودُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُمْ ثُمَّ تَلِينُ جُلُودُهُمْ وَقُلُوبُهُمْ إِلَىٰ ذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُدَى ٱللَّهِ يَهْدِى بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنْ هَادٍ
ayas.translation: Allah hath (now) revealed the fairest of statements, a Scripture consistent, (wherein promises of reward are) paired (with threats of punishment), whereat doth creep the flesh of those who fear their Lord, so that their flesh and their hearts soften to Allah's reminder. Such is Allah's guidance, wherewith He guideth whom He will. And him whom Allah sendeth astray, for him there is no guide.
ayas.transliteration: allāhu nazzala aḥsanal ḥadīthi kitāban mutashābihan mathāniya taqsha`irru minhu julūdul ladhīna yakhshawna rabbahum thumma talīnu julūduhum waqulūbuhum ilā dhikrillāh ۚ dhālika hudallāhi yahdī bihi man yashā-u ۚ wa man yuḍlilillāhu famā lahu min hād

ayas.arabic: أَفَمَن يَتَّقِى بِوَجْهِهِۦ سُوٓءَ ٱلْعَذَابِ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۚ وَقِيلَ لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ ذُوقُوا۟ مَا كُنتُمْ تَكْسِبُونَ
ayas.translation: Is he then, who will strike his face against the awful doom upon the Day of Resurrection (as he who doeth right)? And it will be said unto the wrong-doers: Taste what ye used to earn.
ayas.transliteration: afaman yattaqī biwajhihi sū al `adhābi yawmal qiyāmah ۚ waqīla liẓẓālimīna dhūqū mā kuntum taksibūn

ayas.arabic: كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
ayas.translation: Those before them denied, and so the doom came on them whence they knew not.
ayas.transliteration: kadhhabal ladhīna min qablihim fa-atāhumul `adhābu min ḥaythu lā yash`urūn

ayas.arabic: فَأَذَاقَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْخِزْىَ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ أَكْبَرُ ۚ لَوْ كَانُوا۟ يَعْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: Thus Allah made them taste humiliation in the life of the world, and verily the doom of the Hereafter will be greater if they did but know.
ayas.transliteration: fa-adhāqahumullāhul khizya fil ḥayātid dunyā ۖ wala`adhābul-ākhirati akbar ۚ law kānū ya`lamūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ضَرَبْنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِى هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٍ لَّعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
ayas.translation: And verily We have coined for mankind in this Qur'an all kinds of similitudes, that haply they may reflect;
ayas.transliteration: walaqad ḍarabnā linnāsi fī hādhal qur-āni min kulli mathalin la`allahum yatadhakkarūn

ayas.arabic: قُرْءَانًا عَرَبِيًّا غَيْرَ ذِى عِوَجٍ لَّعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ
ayas.translation: A Lecture in Arabic, containing no crookedness, that haply they may ward off (evil).
ayas.transliteration: qur-ānan `arabiyyan ghayra dhī `iwajin la`allahum yattaqūn

ayas.arabic: ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلًا رَّجُلًا فِيهِ شُرَكَآءُ مُتَشَـٰكِسُونَ وَرَجُلًا سَلَمًا لِّرَجُلٍ هَلْ يَسْتَوِيَانِ مَثَلًا ۚ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ۚ بَلْ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: Allah coineth a similitude: A man in relation to whom are several part-owners, quarrelling, and a man belonging wholly to one man. Are the two equal in similitude? Praise be to Allah! But most of them know not.
ayas.transliteration: ḍaraballāhu mathalan rajulan fīhi shurakā-u mutashākisūna warajulan salamal lirajulin hal yastawiyāni mathalā ۚ al-ḥamdu lillāh ۚ bal aktharuhum lā ya`lamūn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّكَ مَيِّتٌ وَإِنَّهُم مَّيِّتُونَ
ayas.translation: Lo! thou wilt die, and lo! they will die;
ayas.transliteration: innaka mayyitun wa innahum mayyitūn

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ عِندَ رَبِّكُمْ تَخْتَصِمُونَ
ayas.translation: Then lo! on the Day of Resurrection, before your Lord ye will dispute.
ayas.transliteration: thumma innakum yawmal qiyāmati `inda rabbikum takhtaṣimūn

ayas.arabic: فَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّن كَذَبَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلصِّدْقِ إِذْ جَآءَهُۥٓ ۚ أَلَيْسَ فِى جَهَنَّمَ مَثْوًى لِّلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
ayas.translation: And who doth greater wrong than he who telleth a lie against Allah, and denieth the truth when it reacheth him? Will not the home of disbelievers be in hell?
ayas.transliteration: faman aẓlamu mimman kadhaba `alallāhi wakadhhaba biṣ ṣidqi idh jā-ah ۚ alaysa fī jahannama mathwan lilkāfirīn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِى جَآءَ بِٱلصِّدْقِ وَصَدَّقَ بِهِۦٓ ۙ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُتَّقُونَ
ayas.translation: And whoso bringeth the truth and believeth therein - Such are the dutiful.
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhī jā-a biṣ ṣidqi waṣaddaqa bihi ulā-ika humul muttaqūn

ayas.arabic: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
ayas.translation: They shall have what they will of their Lord's bounty. That is the reward of the good:
ayas.transliteration: lahum mā yashā-ūna `inda rabbihim ۚ dhālika jazā-ul muḥsinīn

ayas.arabic: لِيُكَفِّرَ ٱللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ أَسْوَأَ ٱلَّذِى عَمِلُوا۟ وَيَجْزِيَهُمْ أَجْرَهُم بِأَحْسَنِ ٱلَّذِى كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: That Allah will remit from them the worst of what they did, and will pay them for reward the best they used to do.
ayas.transliteration: liyukaffirallāhu `anhum aswa-al ladhī `amilū wayajziyahum ajrahum bi-aḥsanil ladhī kānū ya`malūn

ayas.arabic: أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِكَافٍ عَبْدَهُۥ ۖ وَيُخَوِّفُونَكَ بِٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦ ۚ وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنْ هَادٍ
ayas.translation: Will not Allah defend His slave? Yet they would frighten thee with those beside Him. He whom Allah sendeth astray, for him there is no guide.
ayas.transliteration: alaysallāhu bikāfin `abdah ۖ wayukhawwifūnaka bil ladhīna min dūnih ۚ wa man yuḍlilillāhu famā lahu min hād

ayas.arabic: وَمَن يَهْدِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن مُّضِلٍّ ۗ أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِعَزِيزٍ ذِى ٱنتِقَامٍ
ayas.translation: And he whom Allah guideth, for him there can be no misleader. Is not Allah Mighty, Able to Requite (the wrong)?
ayas.transliteration: wa man yahdillāhu famā lahu min muḍill ۗ alaysallāhu bi`azīzin dhin-tiqām

ayas.arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلْتَهُم مَّنْ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُ ۚ قُلْ أَفَرَءَيْتُم مَّا تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ إِنْ أَرَادَنِىَ ٱللَّهُ بِضُرٍّ هَلْ هُنَّ كَـٰشِفَـٰتُ ضُرِّهِۦٓ أَوْ أَرَادَنِى بِرَحْمَةٍ هَلْ هُنَّ مُمْسِكَـٰتُ رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ قُلْ حَسْبِىَ ٱللَّهُ ۖ عَلَيْهِ يَتَوَكَّلُ ٱلْمُتَوَكِّلُونَ
ayas.translation: And verily, if thou shouldst ask them: Who created the heavens and the earth? they will say: Allah. Say: Bethink you then of those ye worship beside Allah, if Allah willed some hurt for me, could they remove from me His hurt; or if He willed some mercy for me, could they restrain His mercy? Say: Allah is my all. In Him do (all) the trusting put their trust.
ayas.transliteration: wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqas samāwāti wal-arḍa layaqūlunnallāh ۚ qul afara aytum mā tad`ūna min dūnillāhi in arādaniyallāhu biḍurrin hal hunna kāshifātu ḍurrihi aw arādanī biraḥmatin hal hunna mumsikātu raḥmatih ۚ qul ḥasbiyallāh ۖ `alayhi yatawakkalul mutawakkilūn

ayas.arabic: قُلْ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْمَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمْ إِنِّى عَـٰمِلٌ ۖ فَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: Say: O my people! Act in your manner. Lo! I (too) am acting. Thus ye will come to know
ayas.transliteration: qul yāqawmi'-malū `alā makānatikum innī `āmil ۖ fasawfa ta`lamūn

ayas.arabic: مَن يَأْتِيهِ عَذَابٌ يُخْزِيهِ وَيَحِلُّ عَلَيْهِ عَذَابٌ مُّقِيمٌ
ayas.translation: Who it is unto whom cometh a doom that will abase him, and on whom there falleth everlasting doom.
ayas.transliteration: man ya-tīhi `adhābun yukhzīhi wayaḥillu `alayhi `adhābun muqīm

ayas.arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ لِلنَّاسِ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ فَمَنِ ٱهْتَدَىٰ فَلِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَن ضَلَّ فَإِنَّمَا يَضِلُّ عَلَيْهَا ۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِوَكِيلٍ
ayas.translation: Lo! We have revealed unto thee (Muhammad) the Scripture for mankind with truth. Then whosoever goeth right it is for his soul, and whosoever strayeth, strayeth only to its hurt. And thou art not a warder over them.
ayas.transliteration: innā anzalnā `alaykal kitāba linnāsi bil ḥaqq ۖ famanih-tadā falinafsih ۖ wa man ḍalla fa-innamā yaḍillu `alayhā ۖ wa mā anta `alayhim biwakīl

ayas.arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَتَوَفَّى ٱلْأَنفُسَ حِينَ مَوْتِهَا وَٱلَّتِى لَمْ تَمُتْ فِى مَنَامِهَا ۖ فَيُمْسِكُ ٱلَّتِى قَضَىٰ عَلَيْهَا ٱلْمَوْتَ وَيُرْسِلُ ٱلْأُخْرَىٰٓ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
ayas.translation: Allah receiveth (men's) souls at the time of their death, and that (soul) which dieth not (yet) in its sleep. He keepeth that (soul) for which He hath ordained death and dismisseth the rest till an appointed term. Lo! herein verily are portents for people who take thought.
ayas.transliteration: allāhu yatawaffal-anfusa ḥīna mawtihā wal latī lam tamut fī manāmihā ۖ fayumsikul latī qaḍā `alayhal mawta wayursilul-ukhrā ilā ajalin musammā ۚ inna fī dhālika la-āyātin liqawmiy yatafakkarūn

ayas.arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ شُفَعَآءَ ۚ قُلْ أَوَلَوْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ
ayas.translation: Or choose they intercessors other than Allah? Say: What! Even though they have power over nothing and have no intelligence?
ayas.transliteration: amit-takhadhū min dūnillāhi shufa`ā-a ۚ qul awalaw kānū lā yamlikūna shay-an walā ya`qilūn

ayas.arabic: قُل لِّلَّهِ ٱلشَّفَـٰعَةُ جَمِيعًا ۖ لَّهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
ayas.translation: Say: Unto Allah belongeth all intercession. His is the Sovereignty of the heavens and the earth. And afterward unto Him ye will be brought back.
ayas.transliteration: qul lillāhish shafā`atu jamī`ā ۖ lahu mulkus samāwāti wal-arḍ ۖ thumma ilayhi turja`ūn

ayas.arabic: وَإِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ ٱشْمَأَزَّتْ قُلُوبُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۖ وَإِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ إِذَا هُمْ يَسْتَبْشِرُونَ
ayas.translation: And when Allah alone is mentioned, the hearts of those who believe not in the Hereafter are repelled, and when those (whom they worship) beside Him are mentioned, behold! they are glad.
ayas.transliteration: wa idhā dhukirallāhu waḥdahush-ma-azzat qulūbul ladhīna lā yu-minūna bil-ākhirah ۖ wa idhā dhukiral ladhīna min dūnihi idhā hum yastabshirūn

ayas.arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهُمَّ فَاطِرَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ عَـٰلِمَ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ أَنتَ تَحْكُمُ بَيْنَ عِبَادِكَ فِى مَا كَانُوا۟ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ
ayas.translation: Say: O Allah! Creator of the heavens and the earth! Knower of the Invisible and the Visible! Thou wilt judge between Thy slaves concerning that wherein they used to differ.
ayas.transliteration: qulillāhumma fāṭiras samāwāti wal-arḍi `ālimal ghaybi wash shahādati anta taḥkumu bayna `ibādika fī mā kānū fīhi yakhtalifūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَوْ أَنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ مَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا وَمِثْلَهُۥ مَعَهُۥ لَٱفْتَدَوْا۟ بِهِۦ مِن سُوٓءِ ٱلْعَذَابِ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۚ وَبَدَا لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَمْ يَكُونُوا۟ يَحْتَسِبُونَ
ayas.translation: And though those who do wrong possess all that is in the earth, and therewith as much again, they verily will seek to ransom themselves therewith on the Day of Resurrection from the awful doom; and there will appear unto them, from their Lord, that wherewith they never reckoned.
ayas.transliteration: walaw anna lilladhīna ẓalamū mā fil-arḍi jamī`an wa mithlahu ma`ahu laftadaw bihi min sū-il `adhābi yawmal qiyāmah ۚ wabadā lahum minallāhi mā lam yakūnū yaḥtasibūn

ayas.arabic: وَبَدَا لَهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُوا۟ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
ayas.translation: And the evils that they earned will appear unto them, and that whereat they used to scoff will surround them.
ayas.transliteration: wabadā lahum sayyi-ātu mā kasabū waḥāqa bihim mā kānū bihi yastahzi-ūn

ayas.arabic: فَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ ضُرٌّ دَعَانَا ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلْنَـٰهُ نِعْمَةً مِّنَّا قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أُوتِيتُهُۥ عَلَىٰ عِلْمٍۭ ۚ بَلْ هِىَ فِتْنَةٌ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: Now when hurt toucheth a man he crieth unto Us, and afterward when We have granted him a boon from Us, he saith: Only by force of knowledge I obtained it. Nay, but it is a test. But most of them know not.
ayas.transliteration: fa-idhā massal-insāna ḍurrun da`ānā thumma idhā khawwalnāhu ni`matan minnā qāla innamā ūtītuhu `alā `il-m ۚ bal hiya fitnatun walākinna aktharahum lā ya`lamūn

ayas.arabic: قَدْ قَالَهَا ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَمَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
ayas.translation: Those before them said it, yet (all) that they had earned availed them not;
ayas.transliteration: qad qālahal ladhīna min qablihim famā aghnā `anhum mā kānū yaksibūn

ayas.arabic: فَأَصَابَهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُوا۟ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ مِنْ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ سَيُصِيبُهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُوا۟ وَمَا هُم بِمُعْجِزِينَ
ayas.translation: But the evils that they earned smote them; and such of these as do wrong, the evils that they earn will smite them; they cannot escape.
ayas.transliteration: fa-aṣābahum sayyi-ātu mā kasabū ۚ wal ladhīna ẓalamū min hā-ulā-i sayuṣībuhum sayyi-ātu mā kasabū wa mā hum bimu`jizīn

ayas.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبْسُطُ ٱلرِّزْقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقْدِرُ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يُؤْمِنُونَ
ayas.translation: Know they not that Allah enlargeth providence for whom He will, and straiteneth it (for whom He will). Lo! herein verily are portents for people who believe.
ayas.transliteration: awalam ya`lamū annallāha yabsuṭur rizqa liman yashā-u wayaqdir ۚ inna fī dhālika la-āyātin liqawmiy yu-minūn

ayas.arabic: قُلْ يَـٰعِبَادِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسْرَفُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ لَا تَقْنَطُوا۟ مِن رَّحْمَةِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَغْفِرُ ٱلذُّنُوبَ جَمِيعًا ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayas.translation: Say: O My slaves who have been prodigal to their own hurt! Despair not of the mercy of Allah, Who forgiveth all sins. Lo! He is the Forgiving, the Merciful.
ayas.transliteration: qul yā`ibādiyal ladhīna asrafū `alā anfusihim lā taqnaṭū min raḥmatil lāh ۚ innallāha yaghfirudh dhunūba jamī`ā ۚ innahu huwal ghafūrur raḥīm

ayas.arabic: وَأَنِيبُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمْ وَأَسْلِمُوا۟ لَهُۥ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَكُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ ثُمَّ لَا تُنصَرُونَ
ayas.translation: Turn unto your Lord repentant, and surrender unto Him, before there come unto you the doom, when ye cannot be helped.
ayas.transliteration: wa-anībū ilā rabbikum wa-aslimū lahu min qabli an ya-tiyakumul `adhābu thumma lā tunṣarūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱتَّبِعُوٓا۟ أَحْسَنَ مَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكُم مِّن رَّبِّكُم مِّن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَكُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ بَغْتَةً وَأَنتُمْ لَا تَشْعُرُونَ
ayas.translation: And follow the better (guidance) of that which is revealed unto you from your Lord, before the doom cometh on you suddenly when ye know not,
ayas.transliteration: wattabi`ū aḥsana mā unzila ilaykum min rabbikum min qabli an ya-tiyakumul `adhābu baghtatan wa-antum lā tash`urūn

ayas.arabic: أَن تَقُولَ نَفْسٌ يَـٰحَسْرَتَىٰ عَلَىٰ مَا فَرَّطتُ فِى جَنۢبِ ٱللَّهِ وَإِن كُنتُ لَمِنَ ٱلسَّـٰخِرِينَ
ayas.translation: Lest any soul should say: Alas, my grief that I was unmindful of Allah, and I was indeed among the scoffers!
ayas.transliteration: an taqūla nafsun yāḥasratā `alā mā farraṭtu fī janbillāhi wa in kuntu laminas sākhirīn

ayas.arabic: أَوْ تَقُولَ لَوْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هَدَىٰنِى لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
ayas.translation: Or should say: If Allah had but guided me I should have been among the dutiful!
ayas.transliteration: aw taqūla law annallāha hadānī lakuntu minal muttaqīn

ayas.arabic: أَوْ تَقُولَ حِينَ تَرَى ٱلْعَذَابَ لَوْ أَنَّ لِى كَرَّةً فَأَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
ayas.translation: Or should say, when it seeth the doom: Oh, that I had but a second chance that I might be among the righteous!
ayas.transliteration: aw taqūla ḥīna taral `adhāba law anna lī karratan fa-akūna minal muḥsinīn

ayas.arabic: بَلَىٰ قَدْ جَآءَتْكَ ءَايَـٰتِى فَكَذَّبْتَ بِهَا وَٱسْتَكْبَرْتَ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
ayas.translation: (But now the answer will be): Nay, for My revelations came unto thee, but thou didst deny them and wast scornful and wast among the disbelievers.
ayas.transliteration: balā qad jā-at ka āyātī fakadhhabta bihā wastakbarta wakunta minal kāfirīn

ayas.arabic: وَيَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ تَرَى ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَبُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وُجُوهُهُم مُّسْوَدَّةٌ ۚ أَلَيْسَ فِى جَهَنَّمَ مَثْوًى لِّلْمُتَكَبِّرِينَ
ayas.translation: And on the Day of Resurrection thou (Muhammad) seest those who lied concerning Allah with their faces blackened. Is not the home of the scorners in hell?
ayas.transliteration: wayawmal qiyāmati taral ladhīna kadhabū `alallāhi wujūhuhum muswaddah ۚ alaysa fī jahannama mathwan lil-mutakabbirīn

ayas.arabic: وَيُنَجِّى ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ بِمَفَازَتِهِمْ لَا يَمَسُّهُمُ ٱلسُّوٓءُ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
ayas.translation: And Allah delivereth those who ward off (evil) because of their deserts. Evil toucheth them not, nor do they grieve.
ayas.transliteration: wayunajjillāhul ladhīnat-taqaw bimafāzatihim lā yamassuhumus sū-u walā hum yaḥzanūn

ayas.arabic: ٱللَّهُ خَـٰلِقُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَكِيلٌ
ayas.translation: Allah is Creator of all things, and He is Guardian over all things.
ayas.transliteration: allāhu khāliqu kulli shay-ī ۖ wahuwa `alā kulli shay-in wakīl

ayas.arabic: لَّهُۥ مَقَالِيدُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰسِرُونَ
ayas.translation: His are the keys of the heavens and the earth, and they who disbelieve the revelations of Allah - such are they who are the losers.
ayas.transliteration: lahu maqālīdus samāwāti wal-arḍ ۗ wal ladhīna kafarū bi-āyātillāhi ulā-ika humul khāsirūn

ayas.arabic: قُلْ أَفَغَيْرَ ٱللَّهِ تَأْمُرُوٓنِّىٓ أَعْبُدُ أَيُّهَا ٱلْجَـٰهِلُونَ
ayas.translation: Say (O Muhammad, to the disbelievers): Do ye bid me serve other than Allah? O ye fools!
ayas.transliteration: qul afaghayrallāhi ta-murūnnī a`budu ayyuhal jāhilūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أُوحِىَ إِلَيْكَ وَإِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِكَ لَئِنْ أَشْرَكْتَ لَيَحْبَطَنَّ عَمَلُكَ وَلَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ
ayas.translation: And verily it hath been revealed unto thee as unto those before thee (saying): If thou ascribe a partner to Allah thy work will fail and thou indeed wilt be among the losers.
ayas.transliteration: walaqad ūḥiya ilayka wa ilal ladhīna min qablika la-in ashrakta layaḥbaṭanna `amaluka walatakūnanna minal khāsirīn

ayas.arabic: بَلِ ٱللَّهَ فَٱعْبُدْ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّـٰكِرِينَ
ayas.translation: Nay, but Allah must thou serve, and be among the thankful!
ayas.transliteration: balillāha fa`bud wakun minash shākirīn

ayas.arabic: وَمَا قَدَرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدْرِهِۦ وَٱلْأَرْضُ جَمِيعًا قَبْضَتُهُۥ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ وَٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ مَطْوِيَّـٰتٌۢ بِيَمِينِهِۦ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَـٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
ayas.translation: And they esteem not Allah as He hath the right to be esteemed, when the whole earth is His handful on the Day of Resurrection, and the heavens are rolled in His right hand. Glorified is He and High Exalted from all that they ascribe as partner (unto Him).
ayas.transliteration: wa mā qadarullāha ḥaqqa qadrihi wal-arḍu jamī`an qabḍatuhu yawmal qiyāmati was samāwātu maṭwiyyātun biyamīnih ۚ subḥānahu wata`ālā `ammā yushrikūn

ayas.arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَصَعِقَ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۖ ثُمَّ نُفِخَ فِيهِ أُخْرَىٰ فَإِذَا هُمْ قِيَامٌ يَنظُرُونَ
ayas.translation: And the trumpet is blown, and all who are in the heavens and all who are in the earth swoon away, save him whom Allah willeth. Then it is blown a second time, and behold them standing waiting!
ayas.transliteration: wanufikha fiṣ ṣūri faṣa`iqa man fis samāwāti wa man fil-arḍi illā man shā-allāh ۖ thumma nufikha fīhi ukhrā fa-idhā hum qiyāmun yanẓurūn

ayas.arabic: وَأَشْرَقَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ بِنُورِ رَبِّهَا وَوُضِعَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبُ وَجِا۟ىٓءَ بِٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ وَٱلشُّهَدَآءِ وَقُضِىَ بَيْنَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: And the earth shineth with the light of her Lord, and the Book is set up, and the prophets and the witnesses are brought, and it is judged between them with truth, and they are not wronged.
ayas.transliteration: wa-ashraqatil-arḍu binūri rabbihā wawuḍi`al kitābu wajī-a bin nabiyyīna wash shuhadā-i waquḍiya baynahum bil ḥaqqi wahum lā yuẓlamūn

ayas.arabic: وَوُفِّيَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّا عَمِلَتْ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَفْعَلُونَ
ayas.translation: And each soul is paid in full for what it did. And He is Best Aware of what they do.
ayas.transliteration: wawuffiyat kullu nafsin mā `amilat wahuwa a`lamu bimā yaf`alūn

ayas.arabic: وَسِيقَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ زُمَرًا ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُوهَا فُتِحَتْ أَبْوَٰبُهَا وَقَالَ لَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَآ أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ رُسُلٌ مِّنكُمْ يَتْلُونَ عَلَيْكُمْ ءَايَـٰتِ رَبِّكُمْ وَيُنذِرُونَكُمْ لِقَآءَ يَوْمِكُمْ هَـٰذَا ۚ قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ وَلَـٰكِنْ حَقَّتْ كَلِمَةُ ٱلْعَذَابِ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
ayas.translation: And those who disbelieve are driven unto hell in troops till, when they reach it and the gates thereof are opened, and the warders thereof say unto them: Came there not unto you messengers of your own, reciting unto you the revelations of your Lord and warning you of the meeting of this your Day? they say: Yea, verily. But the word of doom of disbelievers is fulfilled.
ayas.transliteration: wasīqal ladhīna kafarū ilā jahannama zumarā ۖ ḥattā idhā jā-ūhā futiḥat abwābuhā waqāla lahum khazanatuhā alam ya-tikum rusulun minkum yatlūna `alaykum āyāti rabbikum wayundhirūnakum liqā-a yawmikum hādhā ۚ qālū balā walākin ḥaqqat kalimatul `adhābi `alal-kāfirīn

ayas.arabic: قِيلَ ٱدْخُلُوٓا۟ أَبْوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ مَثْوَى ٱلْمُتَكَبِّرِينَ
ayas.translation: It is said (unto them): Enter ye the gates of hell to dwell therein. Thus hapless is the journey's end of the scorners.
ayas.transliteration: qīlad-khulū abwāba jahannama khālidīna fīhā ۖ fabi-sa mathwal mutakabbirīn

ayas.arabic: وَسِيقَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ رَبَّهُمْ إِلَى ٱلْجَنَّةِ زُمَرًا ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُوهَا وَفُتِحَتْ أَبْوَٰبُهَا وَقَالَ لَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَا سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَيْكُمْ طِبْتُمْ فَٱدْخُلُوهَا خَـٰلِدِينَ
ayas.translation: And those who keep their duty to their Lord are driven unto the Garden in troops till, when they reach it, and the gates thereof are opened, and the warders thereof say unto them: Peace be unto you! Ye are good, so enter ye (the Garden of delight), to dwell therein;
ayas.transliteration: wasīqal ladhīnat-taqaw rabbahum ilal-jannati zumarā ۖ ḥattā idhā jā-ūhā wafutiḥat abwābuhā waqāla lahum khazanatuhā salāmun `alaykum ṭibtum fadkhulūhā khālidīn

ayas.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى صَدَقَنَا وَعْدَهُۥ وَأَوْرَثَنَا ٱلْأَرْضَ نَتَبَوَّأُ مِنَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ حَيْثُ نَشَآءُ ۖ فَنِعْمَ أَجْرُ ٱلْعَـٰمِلِينَ
ayas.translation: They say: Praise be to Allah, Who hath fulfilled His promise unto us and hath made us inherit the land, sojourning in the Garden where we will! So bounteous is the wage of workers.
ayas.transliteration: waqālul ḥamdu lillāhil ladhī ṣadaqanā wa`dahu wa-awrathanal-arḍa natabawwa-u minal jannati ḥaythu nashā-u ۖ fani`ma ajrul `āmilīn

ayas.arabic: وَتَرَى ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ حَآفِّينَ مِنْ حَوْلِ ٱلْعَرْشِ يُسَبِّحُونَ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّهِمْ ۖ وَقُضِىَ بَيْنَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَقِيلَ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
ayas.translation: And thou (O Muhammad) seest the angels thronging round the Throne, hymning the praises of their Lord. And they are judged aright. And it is said: Praise be to Allah, the Lord of the Worlds!
ayas.transliteration: wataral malā-ikata ḥāffīna min ḥawlil `arshi yusabbiḥūna biḥamdi rabbihim ۖ waquḍiya baynahum bil ḥaqqi waqīlal-ḥamdu lillāhi rabbil `ālamīn
